// è·å–è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨
exports.getOrders = async (req, res) => {
  const { status } = req.query;
  
  try {
    let sql = `
      SELECT o.*, s.name as service_name, s.price, m.name as merchant_name 
      FROM orders o 
      LEFT JOIN services s ON o.service_id = s.id 
      LEFT JOIN merchants m ON s.merchant_id = m.id 
      WHERE 1=1
    `;
    let params = [];
    
    if (status !== undefined) {
      sql += ' AND o.status = ?';
      params.push(status);
    }
    
    sql += ' ORDER BY o.create_time DESC';
    
    const [rows] = await pool.execute(sql, params);
    res.json({ 
      code: 200, 
      data: rows 
    });
  } catch (err) {
    res.json({ 
      code: 500, 
      msg: 'è·å–è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥', 
      error: err.message 
    });
  }
};

const router = createRouter({
  history: createWebHistory(),

export default router;

<script>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue'
import merchantAPI from '../../api/merchant'

export default {
  name: 'MerchantView',
  setup() {
    const merchants = ref([])
    const newMerchant = ref({
      name: '',
      address: '', 
      phone: ''
    })

    // è·å–å•†å®¶åˆ—è¡¨
    const getMerchants = async () => {
      try {
        const response = await merchantAPI.getMerchants()
        merchants.value = response.data.data
      } catch (error) {
        alert('è·å–å•†å®¶åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥ï¼')
        console.error(error)
      }
    }

    // æ–°å¢å•†å®¶
    const addMerchant = async () => {
      if (!newMerchant.value.name || !newMerchant.value.address || !newMerchant.value.phone) {
        alert('è¯·å¡«å†™å®Œæ•´ä¿¡æ¯ï¼')
        return
      }

      try {
        await merchantAPI.addMerchant(newMerchant.value)
        alert('å•†å®¶æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸï¼')
        
        // æ¸…ç©ºè¡¨å•
        newMerchant.value = { name: '', address: '', phone: '' }
        
        // åˆ·æ–°åˆ—è¡¨
        getMerchants()
      } catch (error) {
        alert('æ·»åŠ å•†å®¶å¤±è´¥ï¼')
        console.error(error)
      }
    }

    // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´
    const formatTime = (timeString) => {
      return new Date(timeString).toLocaleString()
    }

    // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½æ—¶è·å–æ•°æ®
    onMounted(() => {
      getMerchants()
    })

    return {
      merchants,
      newMerchant,
      addMerchant,
      formatTime
    }
  }
}
</script>

          <tr>
            <th>è®¢å•ID</th>
            <th>æœåŠ¡åç§°</th>
            <th>å•†å®¶</th>
            <th>ç”¨æˆ·å§“å</th>
            <th>ç”¨æˆ·ç”µè¯</th>
            <th>ä»·æ ¼</th>
            <th>çŠ¶æ€</th>
            <th>ä¸‹å•æ—¶é—´</th>
          </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
          <tr v-for="order in orders" :key="order.id">
            <td>{{ order.id }}</td>
            <td>{{ order.service_name }}</td>
            <td>{{ order.merchant_name }}</td>

            <td>
              <span :class="order.status === 0 ? 'status-pending' : 'status-completed'">
                {{ order.status === 0 ? 'å¾…æ”¯ä»˜' : 'å·²å®Œæˆ' }}
              </span>
            </td>
            <td>{{ formatTime(order.create_time) }}</td>

  </div>
</template>

<script>
import { ref, onMounted, watch } from 'vue'
import orderAPI from '../../api/order'

export default {
  name: 'OrderView',
  setup() {
    const orders = ref([])
    const filterStatus = ref('')

    // è·å–è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨
    const getOrders = async (status = '') => {
      try {
        const response = await orderAPI.getOrders(status)
        orders.value = response.data.data
      } catch (error) {
        alert('è·å–è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥ï¼')
        console.error(error)
      }
    }

    // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´
    const formatTime = (timeString) => {
      return new Date(timeString).toLocaleString()
    }

    // ç›‘å¬ç­›é€‰æ¡ä»¶å˜åŒ–
    watch(filterStatus, (newStatus) => {
      getOrders(newStatus)
    })

    // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½æ—¶è·å–æ•°æ®
    onMounted(() => {
      getOrders()
    })

    return {
      orders,
      filterStatus,
      formatTime
    }
  }
}
</script>

const request = (url, method = 'GET', data = {}) => {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    wx.request({
      url: 'http://localhost:3000/api' + url,
      method,
      data,
      success: (res) => {
        if (res.data.code === 200) {
          resolve(res.data.data)
        } else {
          reject(res.data.msg)
        }
      },
      fail: (err) => {
        reject('ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥ï¼š' + err.errMsg)
      }
    })
  })
}

module.exports = request

const request = require('../../utils/request')

Page({
  data: {
    services: [],
    categories: ['å…¨éƒ¨', 'å®¶æ”¿', 'ç»´ä¿®', 'ä¿æ´'],
    activeCategory: 'å…¨éƒ¨',
    searchKeyword: ''
  },

  onLoad(options) {
    if (options.type) {
      this.setData({ activeCategory: options.type })
    }
    this.getServices()
  },

  // è·å–æœåŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨
  async getServices() {
    const { activeCategory, searchKeyword } = this.data
    
    try {
      let category = activeCategory === 'å…¨éƒ¨' ? '' : activeCategory
      let services = await request('/service/list', 'GET', { category })
      
      // å‰ç«¯æœç´¢è¿‡æ»¤
      if (searchKeyword) {
        services = services.filter(service => 
          service.name.includes(searchKeyword) || 
          service.merchant_name.includes(searchKeyword)
        )
      }
      
      this.setData({ services })
    } catch (err) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: 'åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥',
        icon: 'none'
      })
    }
  },

  // åˆ‡æ¢åˆ†ç±»
  switchCategory(e) {
    const category = e.currentTarget.dataset.category
    this.setData({ 
      activeCategory: category,
      searchKeyword: ''
    })
    this.getServices()
  },

  // æœç´¢è¾“å…¥
  onSearchInput(e) {
    this.setData({ searchKeyword: e.detail.value })
  },

  // æ‰§è¡Œæœç´¢
  onSearch() {
    this.getServices()
  },

  // è·³è½¬åˆ°ä¸‹å•é¡µé¢
  toOrderCreate(e) {
    const service = e.currentTarget.dataset.service
    wx.navigateTo({
      url: `/pages/orderCreate/orderCreate?service=${JSON.stringify(service)}`
    })
  }
})

const request = require('../../utils/request')

Page({
  data: {
    service: null,
    userInfo: {
      name: '',
      phone: ''
    }
  },

  onLoad(options) {
    if (options.service) {
      const service = JSON.parse(options.service)
      this.setData({ service })
    }
  },

  // è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å§“å
  onNameInput(e) {
    this.setData({
      'userInfo.name': e.detail.value
    })
  },

  // è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·ç”µè¯
  onPhoneInput(e) {
    this.setData({
      'userInfo.phone': e.detail.value
    })
  },

  // æäº¤è®¢å•
  async submitOrder() {
    const { service, userInfo } = this.data
    
    if (!userInfo.name.trim()) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å§“å',
        icon: 'none'
      })
      return
    }

    if (!userInfo.phone.trim()) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ‰‹æœºå·',
        icon: 'none'
      })
      return
    }

    // ç®€å•çš„æ‰‹æœºå·éªŒè¯
    const phoneRegex = /^1[3-9]\d{9}$/
    if (!phoneRegex.test(userInfo.phone)) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„æ‰‹æœºå·',
        icon: 'none'
      })
      return
    }

    try {
      wx.showLoading({
        title: 'æäº¤ä¸­...'
      })

      await request('/order/create', 'POST', {
        service_id: service.id,
        user_name: userInfo.name,
        user_phone: userInfo.phone
      })

      wx.hideLoading()
      
      wx.showToast({
        title: 'è®¢å•åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸï¼',
        icon: 'success',
        duration: 2000
      })

      // è·³è½¬åˆ°è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨
      setTimeout(() => {
        wx.navigateTo({
          url: '/pages/orderList/orderList'
        })
      }, 2000)

    } catch (err) {
      wx.hideLoading()
      wx.showToast({
        title: 'è®¢å•åˆ›å»ºå¤±è´¥',
        icon: 'none'
      })
    }
  }
})

const request = require('../../utils/request')

Page({
  data: {
    orders: []
  },

  onLoad() {
    this.getOrders()
  },

  onShow() {
    this.getOrders()
  },

  // è·å–è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨
  async getOrders() {
    try {
      const orders = await request('/order/list')
      this.setData({ orders })
    } catch (err) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: 'åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥',
        icon: 'none'
      })
    }
  },

  // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´
  formatTime(timeString) {
    const date = new Date(timeString)
    return `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}-${date.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0')} ${date.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${date.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0')}`
  }
})
